name: Sweep'n'Sweep
description: Sweep'n'Sweep is a game similar to Minesweeper, but with one difference: when you fill the whole line, it disappears and a new empty one appears on top. Enjoy the new infinite gameplay and try to clear as many lines as possible!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 65 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 65 MB available space Sound Card: Any
